item.title: Use a Windows VM system-assigned managed identity to access Azure Storage via a SAS credential
item.description: Prerequisites Assigning TLS1.2 to Storage Account and VM Adding the VM to the firewall subnet inclusions Create a System Managed Identity and assign to VM Give that System Managed Identity RBAC over the storage account Azure PowerShell Modules Install-Module AzureRM Install-Module Azure -AllowClobber Install-Module Az -AllowClobber #AllowClobber flag removes the overlap between AzureRM, Az, and Azure PS Modules’ conflicting command names. PowerShell Script TLS1.2 can be set it the portal settings as well – following command must have Admin privs.
